ruling: - [[Dark Lucius LV8]] must be on the field in order to negate a monster's effect and remove it from play. If [[Dark Lucius LV8]] is returned to the hand because of [[Begone, Knave!]], it does not negate effects or remove monsters from play.
- If [[Dark Lucius LV8]] destroys [[D.D. Scout Plane]], it will still be Special Summoned because you cannot negate the effect of a monster that is activated while removed from play.
